about_the_game:
Dear Aleksey Lutomski!

Congratulations! Our personnel has positively reviewed your application. We hope you accept this post at the Cipher Bureau and that you'll dutifully serve the Socialist Republic.

We will be expecting You in 1 week at 9:00 AM at the Cipher Bureau on [REDACTED] Street, floor 4, room 57. Your direct supervisor will be waiting there to provide you with the safety instructions and your first tasks will be assigned to you.

AGENTS OF OKO!

At the Cipher Bureau, you will be appointed with tasks of extraordinary magnitude – protecting our homeland from external and internal enemies - thereby safeguarding our common heritage and future. You will encounter great challanges on the path of fulfilling Your duty:

  • Deciphering mysterious messages
  • Problem solving
  • Intelilgence gathering
  • Undercover work
  • Interrogations
  • Renouncing personal considerations in favor of Your duty

Comrades, are you ready to raise the banner of our socialist homeland even higher?

We will be expecting You in 1 week at 9:00 AM at the Cipher Bureau on [REDACTED] Street, floor 4, room 57. Your direct supervisor will be waiting there to provide you with the safety instructions and your first tasks will be assigned to you.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 12 Monterey
  • Processor: Core M
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: What Awaits, Aleksey?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Utilize your analytical skills to connect the dots and unveil hidden conspiracies! Join the ranks of the People's Intelligence Bureau as a junior cryptologist, decipher cryptic messages and unravel plots brewed up by enemies of the state. Or . . . decide to save them...?
